languages.text: "Так вы пираты. Я встретил{mf||а} корабль ваших подельников — они собирались вас вызволять".
languages.translation_comment: Если игрок нашел корабль в астероидном поле и те рассказали, зачем они тут

traits.locale_text: "В системе находится пустотный корабль ваших подельников. Они рассказали мне много интересного и про вас, и про побег".

languages.text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."
languages.original_text: "Так вы пираты. Я встретил{mf||а} корабль ваших подельников — они собирались вас вызволять".

traits.locale_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."
"You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."
"I came across a voidship in the system belonging to your associates. They told me some interesting things about you and your planned escape."
"I came across a voidship in the system belonging to your associates. They told me some interesting things about you and your planned escape."
"I came across a voidship in the system belonging to your associates. They told me some interesting things about you and your planned escape."
"I came across a voidship in the system belonging to your associates. They told me some interesting things about you and your planned escape."
"You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

languages.text: «Son piratas. Encontré una nave del vacío que pertenecía a sus socios. Tenían planes de ayudarlo a fugarse».
languages.original_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

traits.locale_text: «Son piratas. Encontré una nave del vacío que pertenecía a sus socios. Tenían planes de ayudarlo a fugarse».

languages.text: "Ihr seid Piraten. Ich bin auf ein Raumschiff Eurer Leute gestoßen. Sie wollten Euch befreien."
languages.original_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid Piraten. Ich bin auf ein Raumschiff Eurer Leute gestoßen. Sie wollten Euch befreien."

languages.text: « Vous êtes des pirates. Je suis {mf|tombé|tombée} sur un vaisseau appartenant à vos comparses. Ils avaient l'intention de vous venir en aide. »
languages.original_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes des pirates. Je suis {mf|tombé|tombée} sur un vaisseau appartenant à vos comparses. Ils avaient l'intention de vous venir en aide. »

languages.text: “你们是海盗。我之前遇到过一艘虚空舰，里面的人是你们的同伴。他们打算劫狱，把你们捞出来。”
languages.original_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

traits.locale_text: “你们是海盗。我之前遇到过一艘虚空舰，里面的人是你们的同伴。他们打算劫狱，把你们捞出来。”

languages.text: 「お前たちは海賊だな。お前たちの仲間が所有するヴォイドシップに出くわしたぞ。奴らは、お前たちを脱獄させようとしていた」
languages.original_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちは海賊だな。お前たちの仲間が所有するヴォイドシップに出くわした。奴らは、お前たちを解放する計画を立てていた」
「お前たちは海賊だな。お前たちの仲間が所有するヴォイドシップに出くわしたぞ。奴らは、お前たちを脱獄させようとしていた」

languages.text: "Siz korsansınız. Ortaklarınıza ait bir uçsuz gemisine rastladım. Sizi buradan çıkarmayı planlıyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "You are pirates. I came across a voidship belonging to your associates. They were planning to break you out."

traits.locale_text: "Sistemde ortaklarınıza ait bir uçsuz gemisine rastladım. Bana kaçış planınız hakkında ilginç şeyler anlattılar."
"Sistemde ortaklarınıza ait bir uçsuz gemisine rastladım. Bana kaçış planınız hakkında ilginç şeyler anlattılar."
